sourcesContent: Description Priority Due date {{ customer.name }} {{ customer.country.name }} {{ customer.company }} {{ customer.representative.name }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class TodoList { description: string; priority: TodoPriority; dueDate: Date; constructor(data: TodoList){ this.description = data.description; this.priority = data.priority; this.dueDate = data.dueDate; } } export enum TodoPriority{ Low = 1, Medium, Important, } export class AppComponent implements OnInit { todoList: TodoList | undefined; constructor(){ } ngOnInit(): void { //Call here the 'endpoint' to get the information for the todo list } }
